wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Anthony Jones (born 28 November 1962) is a Welsh former professional footballer who played as a forward. He made appearances in the English Football League for hometown club Wrexham and Crewe Alexandra. He also played in New Zealand for Dunedin City.
